price: Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu ndiye Mwenye kuruzuku, Mwenye nguvu, Madhubuti.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلرَّزَّاقُ ذُو ٱلۡقُوَّةِ ٱلۡمَتِينُ
footnotes: Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu peke yake, ndiye mdhamini wa kuwapa riziki waja wake, na Yeye ndiye Mwenye nguvu, Aliye imara, hashindiki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna al-laha huwa al-razāqu dhū al-quwati al-matīnu
